title: Dalhousie medical students gather protective equipment for health care workers
description: Some medical students at Dalhousie University in Halifax are holding a donation drive to collect personal protective equipment  PPE  for front line health care workers in Nova Scotia dealing with COVID
content: Some medical students at Dalhousie University in Halifax are holding a donation drive to collect personal protective equipment  PPE  for front line health care workers in Nova Scotia dealing with COVID   Rumana Rafiq  a second year medical student from Tru    chars
